'''Yeul Gustaverg''' was an [[half-elven]] tailor and seamstress for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Yeul Gustaverg was born to a [[human]] seamstress mother and an [[elf|elven]] tailor father who ran a clothing shop in the city of Neverwinter in the late 15{{th}} century DR. Yeul hoped to inherit her father's business when the time would come, using the seamstress skills taught to her by the human parent.
